item.title: Twitter told its employees to work from home because of the coronavirus
item.description: Twitter is encouraging its bigger than 4,800 workers across the field to brand a living from dwelling based on the unfold of the coronavirus. It’s even handed one of many most drastic steps taken by any tech company up to now based on the outbreak.
